segments.text: I notice the girl is watching the boy so intently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks like she’s waiting for something amazing to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to falling, and she doesn’t even seem worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and she’s just ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever look up and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined to get those cookies, he doesn’t care about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so focused on the cookies, she doesn’t see the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole kitchen is going to flood soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
